@AmericanAir I understand that you are not legally bound to give compensation or voucher but I would hope that as a kind gesture to a frequent traveler, you might reconsider. I’m not trying to sound greedy, even a $200 voucher - nothing to an airline but a lot to me - would be appreciated.

Day 13: spoke with very helpful supervisor @AmericanAir who looks to have figured out refund problems. Will know in 7-10 days. You refused compensation for flight cancellation & missing a wedding. How about now, after adding on hours and phone calls to deal w the refund errors?
